src_original: tathânyeṣu satveṣu tena tisṛbhiḥ paribhāṣaṇābhiḥ svacittaṃ paribhāṣitavyaṃ /
samyakprayuktasya samacittasya bodhisatvasya bodhir na  viṣamacittasya
tgt_original: 一者、佛道為等意，無偏邪意； 二者、佛道等行，無偏邪行；

src_original: anyatre 'mitrasaṃjñôtpādayitavyâmitraṃ hy etan mama /  na maitraṃ /
tgt_original: 若見於子，計如仇怨，不為善知識。

src_original: yo 'ham asyârthāya buddhaprajñaptāśikṣāyôddhuratād gatvâsmin putre 'tiriktataraṃ premôtpādayāmi /  na tathânyeṣu satveṣu /  tena tathā tathā cittam utpādayitavyaṃ yathā yathâsya
tgt_original: 所以者何？ 用是故，令我離於佛種善知識益。

src_original: sarvasatveṣu putrapremânugatā maitry- utpadyate /  ātmakṣemânu ... maitry- utpadyate /
tgt_original: 當以好心念於如來，持諸所有愛子事用，起慈哀於一切人，以自愛身之德用哀愛一切。

src_original: gṛhiṇā bodhisatvena na kasmiṃścid vastuni mamatvaṃ parigraho vā kartavyaḥ /  nâdhyavasānaṃ /  na niyatiḥ na tṛṣṇânuśayaḥ kartavyaḥ /
tgt_original: 居家菩薩不著諸所有，亦無所受、亦無所貪，亦不染愛欲、亦不起、亦不令無所起。

src_original: sacet punar gṛhapate gṛhiṇaṃ bodhisatvaṃ yācanakôpasaṃkramya  kiñcid eva vastu yāceta /  saced asya vastv aparityaktaṃ bhavet /
tgt_original: 居家菩薩若見乞匂者來，所施乞者當云何？

src_original: yady aham etad vastu parityajeyaṃ yadi vā na parityajeyam  avaśyaṃ mamâitena vastunā vinābhāvo bhaviṣyati /  akāmakena maraṇam upa-  [ Bendall ed p20 ---> ]  etac ca vastu māṃ tyakṣyati ahaṃ câinaṃ tyakṣyāmi /  etac ca vastu parityajyâhaṃ āttasāraḥ kālaṃ kariṣyāmi  etac ca parityaktaṃ na me maraṇakāle cittaṃ paryādāya sthāsyati /
tgt_original: 『我持是物布施，會當得律行、除婬妷、生死憂、入正；

src_original: etac ca me maraṇakāle prītiṃ prāmodyam avipratisāritāṃ ca  janayiṣyati /
tgt_original: 我所持物布施，死時為善死； 我用諸所布施故，臨壽終時歡喜，無悔恨心。

src_original: sacet punar evam api samanvāharan śaknuyāt tad vastu parityaktum /  tena sa yācanakaś catasṛbhiḥ saṃjñaptibhiḥ saṃjñapayitavyaḥ /
tgt_original: 』若復心念不能作惠施，見乞者當起四念。
一者、意為羸劣其功德少；
